languages.text: Имперский мир — это одна из миллионов планет, объединенных верой в бессмертного Бога-Императора. От обществ с высочайшим уровнем развития технологий до мрачных оплотов феодализма — все население бесчисленных миров демонстрирует преданность Повелителю Человечества и Имперскому кредо, чтимому Eго слугами. Под обозначением "имперский мир" могут скрываться самые разнообразные и непохожие миры, которые, тем не менее, входят в состав Империума.
languages.original_text: An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Имперский мир — это одна из миллионов планет, объединенных верой в бессмертного Бога-Императора. От обществ с высочайшим уровнем развития технологий до мрачных оплотов феодализма — все население бесчисленных миров демонстрирует преданность Повелителю Человечества и имперскому кредо, чтимому Eго слугами. Во главе большинства имперских миров стоит планетарный губернатор. Также важную роль в них играет аристократия — своего рода привилегированный правящий класс.

Имперский мир — это одна из миллионов планет, объединенных верой в бессмертного Бога-Императора. От обществ с высочайшим уровнем развития технологий до мрачных оплотов феодализма — все население бесчисленных миров демонстрирует преданность Повелителю Человечества и имперскому кредо, чтимому Eго слугами. Во главе большинства имперских миров стоит планетарный губернатор. Также важную роль в них играет аристократия — своего рода привилегированный правящий класс.

traits.locale_text: An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. Most Imperial worlds are ruled by a planetary governor and support a thriving ruling class of some sort, known usually as nobility.

An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

languages.text: Eine imperiale Welt ist einer unter einer Million von Planeten, die durch den Glauben an den unsterblichen Gottimperator vereint sind. Die Bewohner zahlloser Welten, von hypertechnologischen Gesellschaften bis hin zu schmutzigen Feudalvölkern, erweisen dem Meister der Menschheit und dem imperialen Glauben seiner Diener Lehnstreue und Ergebenheit. Die Bezeichnung „Imperiale Welt“ umfasst eine breite Palette gänzlich unterschiedlicher Welten, die nichtsdestotrotz alle Teil des Imperiums sind.
languages.original_text: An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Eine imperiale Welt unter einer Million von Planeten, die durch den Glauben an den unsterblichen Gottimperator vereint sind. Die Bewohner zahlloser Welten, von hypertechnologischen Gesellschaften bis hin zu schmutzigen Feudalvölkern, erweisen dem Meister der Menschheit und dem imperialen Glauben seiner Diener Lehnstreue und Ergebenheit. Die meisten imperialen Welten werden von einem planetarischen Gouverneur regiert und beherbergen eine florierende herrschende Klasse, die meist als Adel bekannt ist.

languages.text: Les mondes impériaux englobent des millions de planètes unies par la croyance en un Empereur-Dieu immortel. Qu'il s'agisse de sociétés ultra-technologiques ou de populations féodales indigentes, les habitants d'innombrables mondes vouent un culte au Maître de l'Humanité et se reconnaissent dans le Credo Impérial adopté par Ses serviteurs. Le terme « monde impérial » désigne un ensemble très hétéroclite de planètes qui font toutes partie de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Les mondes impériaux englobent des millions de planètes unies par la croyance en un Empereur-Dieu immortel. Qu'il s'agisse de sociétés ultra-technologiques ou de populations féodales indigentes, les habitants d'innombrables mondes vouent un culte au Maître de l'Humanité et se reconnaissent dans le Credo Impérial adopté par Ses serviteurs. Le terme « monde impérial » désigne un ensemble très hétéroclite de planètes qui font toutes partie de l'Imperium.

languages.text: 帝国世界指的是帝国麾下的几百万颗行星，基于对不朽神皇的虔诚信仰紧密联系在一起。帝国世界既包括科技极其发达的社会，也包括破败不堪的封建社会。无数世界的居民都崇拜着人类之主，这些世界的虔诚臣民全心全意地恪守着帝国信仰。帝国世界包含各种各样截然不同的世界，但即便如此，这些世界也都是帝国的一部分。
languages.original_text: An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 帝国世界指的是帝国麾下的几百万颗行星，基于对不朽神皇的虔诚信仰紧密联系在一起。帝国世界既包括科技极其发达的社会，也包括破败不堪的封建社会。无数世界的居民都崇拜着人类之主，这些世界的虔诚臣民全心全意地恪守着帝国信仰。绝大多数帝国世界都由行星总督统治，帝国世界中奢靡的统治阶层通常被称为贵族。

languages.text: Un mundo Imperial es uno del millón de planetas unidos por la fe en el Dios Emperador inmortal. Estos planetas van desde sociedades hipertecnológicas hasta mugrientas poblaciones feudales, y los habitantes de estos incontables mundos deben lealtad al señor de la Humanidad y al Credo imperial que promulgan sus sirvientes. La designación de «mundo Imperial» engloba una amplísima gama de mundos completamente dispares que no por ello dejan de ser parte del Imperium.
languages.original_text: An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Un mundo Imperial es uno del millón de planetas unidos por la fe en el Dios Emperador inmortal. Estos planetas van desde sociedades hipertecnológicas hasta mugrientas poblaciones feudales, y los habitantes de estos incontables mundos deben lealtad al señor de la Humanidad y al Credo imperial que promulgan sus sirvientes. La mayoría de mundos Imperiales están bajo el mando de un gobernador planetario y una clase gobernante, por lo general llamada la nobleza.

languages.text: インペリアルワールドとは、不滅なる神帝陛下への信仰によって結ばれた100万もの惑星の1つだ。超技術社会から薄暗い封建的集団まで、数え切れないほどの惑星の住人が、人類の支配者とそのしもべたちが信奉する帝国信条集に忠誠と献身を誓っている。「インペリアルワールド」という呼び名は、まったく異質で膨大な数の惑星を包含しているが、それすらも帝国の一部なのだ。
languages.original_text: An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: インペリアルワールドとは、不滅なる神帝陛下への信仰によって結ばれた100万もの惑星の1つだ。超技術社会から薄暗い封建的集団まで、数え切れないほどの惑星の住人が、人類の支配者とそのしもべたちが信奉する帝国信条集に忠誠と献身を誓っている。ほとんどのインペリアルワールドは惑星総督によって統治され、通常は貴族として知られるある種の支配階級を支えている。

languages.text: Bir İmparatorluk dünyası, ölümsüz Tanrı İmparator inancının şemsiyesi altında birleşmiş milyonlarca gezegenden biridir. Hiper teknolojik toplumlardan pis feodal halklara kadar sayısız dünyanın sakinleri, İnsanlığın Efendisi'ne ve O'nun hizmetkârlarınca benimsenmiş İmparatorluk İtikatı'na sadakat ve bağlılıklarını sunarlar. "İmparatorluk dünyası" tanımlaması, birbirlerine uzaktan yakından benzememelerine rağmen yine de İmparatorluk'un parçası olan geniş bir gezegenler kümesini kapsar.
languages.original_text: An Imperial world is one of a million planets united by the belief in the immortal God-Emperor. Hailing from hyper-technological societies to grimy feudal populations, the inhabitants of countless worlds offer fealty and devotion to the Master of Humanity and the Imperial Creed espoused by His servants. The designation "Imperial world" encompasses a vast array of wholly dissimilar worlds that are, nevertheless, part of the Imperium.
